original_title: Naked Hollywood 3: Love in the Electronic Age
overview: Love in the Electronic Age creates a whole new set of rules! Kim meets her online lover and his wife! Annie and Monica feel the "vibe" at a sex toy party then go home to take matters into their own hands! And Lindsey's new lover is her #1 fan and the best lay she's ever had!
title: Naked Hollywood 3: Love in the Electronic Age
